S

saved - Variable in class Game
This stores whether the user input for name has been saved.
score - Variable in class Game
The user's current level score.
SCORES_FILE - Variable in class Game
This stores the file location of the high score storing file.
SCORES_FILE - Variable in class Highscores
This stores a file location of the highscores file.
SCORES_FILE_BACKUP - Variable in class Game
This stores a backup file location of the high score storing file, in case the directory of SCORES_FILE is inaccessible.
SCORES_FILE_BACKUP - Variable in class Highscores
This stores a backup file location of the highscorse storing file, in case the directory of SCORES_FILE is inaccessible.
setCursor(int) - Method in class Window
This method modifies the cursor being displayed on screen, and it is used throughout the program to show that some items can be clicked.
showAndWait() - Method in class Window
Hide the Stage in case it isn't already hidden and then show it, and wait until it is hidden once again before continuing with the current Thread.
shower - Variable in class Quiz
This stores the shower device.
sink - Variable in class Quiz
This stores the sink device.
Sound - Class in <Unnamed>
The Sound class This class stores sound media, and allows specific AudioClips to be played, stopped, and looped.
Sound(String) - Constructor for class Sound
This is the class constructor.
SplashScreen - Class in <Unnamed>
The Splashscreen class This class represents the window with an animation that plays at the start of the program with the Pistachio Labs logo, and then loads program Resources to avoid lag during runtime.
SplashScreen(Stage) - Constructor for class SplashScreen
This is the class constructor.
stage - Variable in class Window
The Window's JavaFX Stage.
StageManager - Class in <Unnamed>
The StageManager class This class puts together all the windows of the program, and organises the program flow.
StageManager() - Constructor for class StageManager
 
start(Stage) - Method in class StageManager
This method will load all the necessary Sound resources into the Resources class, open all the necessary windows and will control the program's flow.
startNanoTime - Variable in class Game
Store the current time in nanoseconds.
startTime - Variable in class Water
The number of elapsed nanoseconds since the beginning of runtime up until the creation of the current Water Object.
startX - Variable in class Game
This stores the point at which the frame view of the LogLine and DeviceLine images is at.
stop() - Method in class Sound
This method stops the sound.
stopAll() - Static method in class Sound
This static method stops all AudioClips created with this class, by looping through the static ArrayList all, and calling stop() on each element.
